analysis.key_quote: By allowing employees to be fired at will, this will essentially force loyalty to one political party or another from employees trying to do their job, jobs which really, really shouldn’t be politically aligned.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of civil service, the potential loss of experienced employees, and the importance of maintaining a merit-based system. The request to withdraw the rule indicates a clear opposition to the changes being proposed.
